This wonderful page on SFGate.com features breathtaking videos and pictures of weddings in San Francisco. I'm not a sentimental guy, but I admit, the videos often made me tear up.
 
 It's only a matter of time...soon we'll all be able to marry, and the U.S. will earn the right to truly consider itself "the home of the free."

title: 4Forums.com Political Debates and Polls -  Time to celebrate
